title: Forever in His Arms
description: Whispers of war between North and South were riding the wind the summer Jenny Delaney fell in love with Tyler Mackenzie. But high in the Smoky Mountains of Tennessee, it was still possible to believe in fairy tale endings…even though Jenny knew in her heart that the blood feud between the Delaneys and the Mackenzies was as inescapable as the coming war. Time was fast running out for secret trysts and lovers' dreams, and she would have to choose…between the life she held so dear and the man whose passion made her burn as brightly as the evening star…
author: Penelope Neri
